title: quick question who is the most fun to play champion
body: just wan ta fun champ to play i own them all and dont care what role

replies.body:
Aurelion Sol by far has the best personality, i find myself miming all the words along with him when i play. And his playstyle is pretty dam fun, swirling around smacking ppl with stars.

But in my opinion one of the most fun to play is Singed, you're just unkillable and you run around laughing watching lowly peasants dying while trying to catch you. Its hilarious.

It's a quick question that deserves a very long and drawn out answer. Considering there are so many champions and so many meta/ off meta ways to play them you can just open up any champ page on the wiki, check their ap/ad ratios and give it a crack.

ADC: Jhin or Jinx
Support: Thresh
Mid: Annie (no bias).
Top: I love unconventional things like Karma top.
Jungle: What's this?
Just learn how to play a champion you havent really played before, i personally enjoyed learning how to play Vayne and Kindred
Oh wait i forgot riot changed kindred

MATE!
